Text:
Please be patient.  I will continue seeding until there is no more interest.

I waited a week before I finished the upload of the series so that some of the burden was removed from my system, but it is still going to be slow for a while.

Thank you for your patience.

So the files in this torrent can also be downloaded from here:  http://www.ucg.org/abc/religion/ 
Correct?
here is the movie that people should be sharing regarding religion http://www.thegodmovie.com/
yup, thats better than that superstitious twaddle, at least there`s a cogent argument.

Please seed if you like the programs.  I have been uploading these classes to thousands of people from all over the world over the last 2 years, and it can be very slow for them without the help of other seeders.

Thanks for your help, and God bless you too.
